hero.title: Leaders in Manufacturing Innovative Plastic Additives
hero.subtitle: We drive innovation in the sustainable polymer industry to support industrial development and Saudi Vision 2030

about.title: About Us
about.vision: To be the trusted and preferred partner in Saudi Arabia and global markets in providing plastic filler and masterbatch solutions
about.mission: Manufacturing high-quality plastic filler (Calcium Carbonate) and color masterbatch to meet diverse market needs with commitment to quality and environment
about.background: We possess strong expertise in additives backed by polymer engineers and experts driving innovation through R&D to produce eco-friendly plastic solutions

filler.title: Plastic Filler
filler.subtitle: Omya / Concentrated Calcium Carbonate
filler.description: We manufacture high-quality plastic filler based on calcium carbonate, which improves mechanical properties, reduces costs, and enhances processability of final plastic products
features: Various purity grades and particle sizes

colorMasterbatch.title: Color Masterbatch
colorMasterbatch.description: Standard or custom colors for precision coloring of plastic products with high consistency and custom development capabilities

whiteMasterbatch.title: White Masterbatch
whiteMasterbatch.description: Increases opacity of plastic products to improve appearance and visual quality

blackMasterbatch.title: Black Masterbatch
blackMasterbatch.description: Provides rich and consistent black color with UV resistance properties for superior durability

additiveMasterbatch.title: Additive Masterbatch
additiveMasterbatch.description: Additives including antioxidants, UV stabilizers, flame retardants, and slip agents to improve polymer performance

industrial.title: Industrial Sector
industrial.description: Our solutions improve performance of industrial plastic components, extending their lifespan and enhancing mechanical properties

agricultural.title: Agricultural Sector
agricultural.description: Our products are essential for manufacturing durable agricultural solutions such as irrigation pipes and greenhouse films

medical.title: Medical Sector
medical.description: We are committed to providing materials that meet strict medical industry standards where precision and purity are critical

packaging.title: Packaging
packaging.description: Our products help produce lightweight, durable, and economical plastic packaging while maintaining visual appeal

consumerGoods.title: Consumer Goods
consumerGoods.description: We help bring vibrant colors and durability to a wide range of consumer products from toys to household items

construction.title: Construction & Building
construction.description: We contribute high-quality plastic building materials such as pipes and fittings featuring durability and corrosion resistance

workflow.title: Our Workflow
workflow.designDesc: Understanding customer needs and developing formulations in labs using cutting-edge technologies
workflow.manufacturingDesc: Using state-of-the-art production lines and equipment to ensure precision and efficiency
workflow.qcDesc: Comprehensive testing including particle size analysis, density, melting, color analysis, and mechanical properties
workflow.packagingDesc: Careful packaging of products to ensure safety during transport and storage
workflow.logisticsDesc: Efficient logistics network ensuring fast and reliable delivery throughout Saudi Arabia and globally

fda.title: FDA Standards
fda.description: We ensure our food and medical packaging products comply with Saudi Arabia standards and international requirements

rohs.title: RoHS Guidelines
rohs.description: We adhere to guidelines restricting hazardous substances in electrical and electronic equipment

reach.title: REACH Regulations
reach.description: We ensure compliance with regulations on registration, evaluation, authorization and restriction of chemicals

quality.title: Unmatched Quality
quality.description: We commit to quality in everything we deliver, using best raw materials and cutting-edge manufacturing techniques

flexibility.title: Flexibility
flexibility.description: Ability to adapt and rapidly respond to changing market requirements and specific customer needs

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Developing eco-friendly solutions that contribute to a more sustainable future for our planet

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Continuous pursuit of developing new products and processes that enhance efficiency and open new horizons

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: Our customers trust us because we commit to on-time delivery and consistent quality backed by strong supply chain

techFacilities.title: Advanced Technical Facilities
techFacilities.description: Omimix operates modern production facilities and advanced laboratories where R&D teams work on product analysis

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: At Omimix, we are always ready to answer your inquiries and provide the support you need
